page.title: 09CHURCHES AND SCHOOLS
page.content: There are 7{churches}in the area. The Church of England is represented by two churches;Milnrow St.James and Newhey St.Thomas each of which has an associated day school. There are five non-conformist churches; Ogden Baptist,Moorhouse Methodist, Newhey Methodist,an Evangelical church and St Stephens U.R. which does not have a building and worships as a church in Milnrow Parish church. The Evangelical church meets at the Community Centre. The area is served by 5 primary {schools}and one secondary school.The last primary school to open was Crossgates in September 1975. The 11-18 secondary school,Roch Valley High School was opened in January 1965 Education in the area is at present suffering because of poor buildings, underfunding and strike action by some teachers seeking higher pay.
